\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 44093}

\subsection*{Worthwhile Smoke}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Raccoonist}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Damiana & leaves\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Hey this stuff is pretty good for the `I have to quit smoking cannabis for awhile' blues.   

It doesn't get me high, but I do notice slight relaxation and some small twinges of psychoactiveness for about 30 minutes after smoking a couple bowls of this stuff. Pretty cheap, and legal, too.  It helps to get my mind off cannabis.

\end{document}
